verses.verse: Michtam <WH4387> of David. <WH1732> Preserve <WH8104> me, O God: <WH410> for <WH3588> in thee do I put my trust. <WH2620>
O my soul, thou hast said <WH559> unto the LORD, <WH3068> Thou <WH859> art my Lord: <WH136> my goodness <WH2896> extendeth not <WH1077> to <WH5921> thee;
But to the saints <WH6918> that <WH834> are in the earth, <WH776> and to the excellent, <WH117> in whom is all <WH3605> my delight. <WH2656>

Their sorrows <WH6094> shall be multiplied <WH7235> that hasten <WH4116> after another <WH312> god: their drink offerings <WH5262> of blood <WH4480> <WH1818> will I not <WH1077> offer, <WH5258> nor <WH1077> take up <WH5375> <WH853> their names <WH8034> into <WH5921> my lips. <WH8193>
The LORD <WH3068> is the portion <WH4521> of mine inheritance <WH2506> and of my cup: <WH3563> thou <WH859> maintainest <WH8551> my lot. <WH1486>
The lines <WH2256> are fallen <WH5307> unto me in pleasant <WH5273> places; yea, <WH637> I have <WH5921> a goodly <WH8231> heritage. <WH5159>
I will bless <WH1288> <WH853> the LORD, <WH3068> who <WH834> hath given me counsel: <WH3289> my reins <WH3629> also <WH637> instruct <WH3256> me in the night seasons. <WH3915>
I have set <WH7737> the LORD <WH3068> always <WH8548> before <WH5048> me: because <WH3588> he is at my right hand, <WH4480> <WH3225> I shall not <WH1077> be moved. <WH4131>
Therefore <WH3651> my heart <WH3820> is glad, <WH8055> and my glory <WH3519> rejoiceth: <WH1523> my flesh <WH1320> also <WH637> shall rest <WH7931> in hope. <WH983>
For <WH3588> thou wilt not <WH3808> leave <WH5800> my soul <WH5315> in hell; <WH7585> neither <WH3808> wilt thou suffer <WH5414> thine Holy One <WH2623> to see <WH7200> corruption. <WH7845>

Thou wilt show <WH3045> me the path <WH734> of life: <WH2416> in <WH854> thy presence <WH6440> is fullness <WH7648> of joy; <WH8057> at thy right hand <WH3225> there are pleasures <WH5273> forevermore. <WH5331>
